segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is a total mess in the making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing with dirty water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is just standing there, one foot in the filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not smell or feel the wet disaster?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are soaked, probably warping from the moisture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing around in this slop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is wobbling near the puddle; he'll slip for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching into the cookie jar like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Contaminating the cookies with his grubby hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just enabling him, hand out for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is gross, with water and mischief mixing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The nice garden outside can't hide the indoor nastiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean this up before it's unbearable.
segments.speaker: PAR
